known_issues: Automated build failed/struggled when attempting to implement 'fine-tune the map' request; may require rephrasing or breaking into smaller steps.

existing_features.title: Add a user-facing control to fine-tune Google Maps link behavior by allowing the user to set a preferred zoom level (with a sensible default) and persist that preference locally (e.g., localStorage) so it is reused across sessions.
Update all existing Google Maps links in the app that open coordinates to use the preferred zoom level when generating the URL (including MeetupPage and the SOS last-known-location view).
Refactor map URL generation into a shared frontend utility so all map links are consistent and easy to adjust in one place (e.g., a single function that takes latitude, longitude, and optional zoom).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add an option to fine-tune map controls
